scripts.stopApi: docker-compose stop api-gateway && docker-compose rm -f api-gateway
scripts.rebuildApi: npm run stopApi && npm run buildApi
scripts.stopAppoint: docker-compose stop appointment-service && docker-compose rm -f appointment-service
scripts.rebuildAppoint: npm run stopAppoint && npm run buildAppoint
scripts.stopNotif: docker-compose stop notification-service && docker-compose rm -f notification-service
scripts.rebuildNotif: npm run stopNotif && npm run buildNotif
scripts.stopAccount: docker-compose stop account-service && docker-compose rm -f account-service
scripts.rebuildAccount: npm run stopAccount && npm run buildAccount
